definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Put the quince pieces in the pot.
Your quinces and pineapple guavas have gone quickly.
sentences.chinese: 你的榅桲和凤梨芭乐销路挺快。

sentences.english: Therefore, Cydonia oblonga Mill has highly value to popularize in North China.
sentences.chinese: 因此，在我国北方，榅桲具有很高的推广价值。

sentences.english: She caught sight of something dark in the branches of the old quince tree in front of the house.
sentences.chinese: 她看了一眼房子前那颗老榅桲树树枝里黑黑的东西。

sentences.english: Pear trees are grafted on quince rootstocks.
sentences.chinese: 梨树被嫁接到榅的根茎上。

sentences.english: Tree ripe quince is perfect for making the preserves.
sentences.chinese: 树上熟榅桲正好拿来做果酱。

sentences.english: Yellow quinces in buckets with green melons were stored on the deck.
sentences.chinese: 黄黄的榅桲装小桶和绿绿的香瓜同放阳台。

definition: variant of 坋[ben4]/old variant of 笨[ben4]
dust/to dust/a bank of earth/to bring together/to dig/also pr. [fen4]
mountain covered with vegetation/the residence of one's father/see also 屺[qi3]
bamboo conduit/wooden peg/spout/same as 筧|笕
